entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of thunderstorms late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 15. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low 8.
